name: Boo-Hind You!
description:
Welcome to Boo-Hind You! This is a game made in just 48 hours for the Spooky2D Game Jam! The music is the creative commons "Halloween Theme 1" by Alexander Nakarada. All other assets were made by us during the 48 hours.

Navigate through the dark maze as Timmy, a young candy-loving kid trying to escape. See with the help of the on-screen flashlight. Avoid Boo, the sluggish ghost, and make it to the ladder. Candy is scattered throughout the maze, try to collect them all!

Creators:
Parker L - Programming, Sounds, Level Design, Gameplay Design
Justin K - Art, Gameplay Design

Big thank you to Theo for hosting this jam, this was each of ours' first game jam, and we had a lot of fun.
And thank you to YoYo Games as I used GameMaker Studio 1.4 to program the game.

https://github.com/ParkerLeathers/Boohind-You
